name: asymmetry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of two halves, sides, or parts that are not exactly the same in shape or size: The brain scan showed a hemispheric asymmetry. Physicists are investigating the apparent asymmetry in the amounts of matter and antimatter in the universe.
the condition of not being equal or equally available between two people or groups : power/information asymmetries Economic asymmetry between the rich and the poor has worsened in recent years. See
asymmetric
More examplesFewer examplesSome people find the asymmetry of the building disorientating.Asymmetry has been used in the stadium design to customize parts of the building for specific purposes.Nuclear asymmetry has made some nations fearful and suspicious.Pockets of economic, educational, and demographic asymmetries need to be addressed on both the local and the national level.
